resources.string:
GuessFour is a logic game. Try to guess the secret code that has been chosen. The code contains four colored pegs. The pegs may be blue, green, orange, purple, red, or yellow.

 Guess the color and order of the pegs in the code. After each guess you get feedback. Each white feedback peg indicates one of your pegs is the right color, but is in the wrong position. Each black feedback peg indicates one of your pegs is the right color and in the right position. You are not told which of your pegs generate the feedback pegs.

 You have 12 guesses to crack the code.

 The easy version of the game has a code with 3 pegs and only uses 4 colors of pegs.

 The hard version of the game has a code with 5 pegs and 8 colors of pegs. (pink and teal)
Your guess is complete. Press \"Make Guess\" to enter enter or \"Clear Peg\" to remove your last selection.
There are no pegs in your guess. Press a colored rectangle to the right to add a peg of that color to your guess.
Your guess is not complete. Add pegs by pressing the colored rectangles to the right.
You are out of guesses. Try again.
